Title: Establishes a drug checking program
Summary: Establishes through the department of health a drug checking program to allow individuals to bring drugs or controlled substances and have them tested for contaminants, toxic substances, or hazardous compounds; requires the department to establish public health surveillance of the unregulated drug supply.
LawCode: Add ยง3309-c, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to establishing a drug checking program including requirements for enhanced drug checking service delivery and public health surveillance
